group_1.textLeft: I know what I'm doing...
I know I'm being too protective of Ayame...

group_1.narration: —Konoha—@Do you remember when the director@gave us these necklaces?
—Hazuki—@The director had matching necklaces@made for each of us.
—Konoha—@She put me in charge of Ayame.
—Konoha—@When we got the matching necklaces, I thought...
—Konoha—@I'm the oldest, so I have to protect them.
—Konoha—@I felt like we were a family, and that's why...

group_1.textLeft: But I know that there's a difference between@showing concern and acting overbearing.
I know that...

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah, to be honest with you...
You're like a parent who won't let their kid@leave the nest.

group_1.textLeft: Ugh...
...I was aware of that, but it hurts to hear@you say it...

group_1.textRight: I'm glad you're aware of it.

group_1.textLeft: ...There's a part of me that feels like I need@to separate from Ayame, but...
...I'm just not ready to do it.

group_1.textRight: Say, Konoha...@You don't have any hobbies, do you?

group_1.textLeft: What... Hobbies?@Why bring that up?

group_1.textRight: In my opinion...
I think you put too much focus on Ayame.
You're all about Ayame.
So you get worried over the slightest things,@isn't that right?

group_1.textLeft: ...That's true.

group_1.textRight: Then if you find something else to be passionate@about, like a hobby or some other interests,
that might calm you down a little.

group_1.textLeft: ...I see.
It might be a good idea to diversify my interests.

group_1.textRight: Yeah!@What do you wanna do?

group_1.textLeft: ...Collect a lot of points when I shop.
I also need to learn more about investing.@It's always good to have money.

group_1.textRight: ...No, I don't mean for a living.
I mean something you just have fun with.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...?@Even if you tell me that...

group_1.textRight: Does nothing come to mind?

group_1.textLeft: No, I can't think of anything...

group_1.textRight: Anything would be fine, though...

group_1.textLeft: I don't want to waste money on something@I have no interest in...

group_1.textRight: Well, how about we go for walks together?

group_1.textLeft: Walks...?

group_1.textRight: It's simple to start and doesn't cost money.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...

group_1.textRight: I've been thinking of taking early morning walks@as much as I can.
You could come along with me.@Well, what do you think?

group_1.textLeft: ...I suppose I'll give it a try...

group_1.textRight: Okay!
Well then, let's go for a little walk tomorrow@morning before we go to school!
